title: IBM to Acquire Apptio Inc., Providing Actionable Financial and Operational Insights Across Enterprise IT - PR Newswire
summary: IBM has announced the acquisition of Apptio Inc., a leader in financial and operational IT management and optimization software, to enhance its IT automation capabilities and help enterprises manage technology spend across hybrid and multi-cloud environments.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 511210 - Software Publishers, 518210 - Data Processing, Hosting, and Related Services, 541511 - Custom Computer Programming Services, 541512 - Computer Systems Design Services
